name: White Elephant
description: An ex-marine enforcer must battle his conscience and code of honor when he is forced to do things for the mob.

review.author: jonahjc-32829
review.heading: Give Bruce a break
review.reviewBody: My guess is that some of these reviewers are not very informed movie people. I dont think they have heard the news regarding Bruce Willis health.(Quite a while ago) The announcement of his stepping away from acting due to health reasons (Aphasia) . Which directly affecting his ability to perform to his highest level. A lot of actors have contracts even before a movie is made. He stuck it through and fulfilled that. Thats honorable...give him a break a already & be informed before you judge.
